# Sample filenames for testing filename parsing
# Format: filename | expected tokens

# Standard format
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_20240101.s2p
RED_sn0001_l123456_cld_240101.s2p
L999999_HOT_20231231_PRI_SN9999.s3p

# Case variations
pri_SN1234_amb_L123456_20240101.s2p
red_sn5678_CLD_l987654_240101.s2p

# Missing tokens (should report missing)
SN1234_PRI_20240101.s2p  # Missing part_number, temperature
L567890_AMB.s2p  # Missing serial_number, path, date

# Unknown tokens (should ignore)
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_20240101_UNKNOWN_TOKEN.s2p
TEST_SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_20240101.s2p

# Date variations
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_20240101.s2p  # YYYYMMDD
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_240101.s2p  # YYMMDD
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_2024-01-01.s2p  # ISO format (if supported)

# Edge cases
SN1234.s2p  # Minimal
.s2p  # Empty name
SN1234_PRI_L567890_AMB_20240101_EXTRA_DATA.s2p  # Extra data
